dataset_id: NRSCC Global LAnd Surface Satellite Photosynthetically Active Radiation (PAR)
title: NRSCC Global LAnd Surface Satellite Photosynthetically Active Radiation (PAR)
summary: Vast amounts of remotely sensed data have been collected from more than a dozen satellites and ground measurements. From these data,a suite of new inversion algorithms and Global LAnd Surface Satellite (GLASS) products have been developed and released:leaf area index(LAI),shortwave broadband albedo,Evapotranspiration(ET),Fraction of Photosynthetically Active Radiation(FAPAR),Photosynthetically Active Radiation(PAR) etc.
